external_references.description: Chen, J. et al. (2021, February 3). Hildegard: New TeamTNT Cryptojacking Malware Targeting Kubernetes. Retrieved April 5, 2021.

description: [TeamTNT](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0139) has developed custom malware such as [Hildegard](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0601).(Citation: Unit 42 Hildegard Malware)
